name: Beach Party Run 3D
description:
Are you ready for the hottest party ever?

Run through an endless beach and try to pick up all the people for the party!
Beware of the obstacles who want to steal your party joy!
Collect items to boost the party atmosphere!
Try to reach a maximum number of crowd to pass the level!
Looking for some fun, party and thrill? Then this 3d running game is just for you.

=== HOW TO PLAY ===
◉ Simple and intuitive game with easy-to-remember controls.
◉ Just swipe to control your character!
◉ Carry the people and collect the items to boost the party!
◉ Run away from the obstacles.

=== GAME FEATURES ===
◉ FREE and EASY to play!
◉ Multiple LEVELS with INCREASING DIFFUCULTY.
◉ Lots of people to CARRY!
◉ Lots of items to collect to BOOST the PARTY!
publishers: BREW OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
